Package index

GMD data

Utilities for GMD data

dlw_get_gmd()
Get GMD data.
dlw_get_gmd_support()
get Support files for GMD

Get data

dlw_get_data()
Get data from datalibweb (refactored)
dlw_country_catalog()
Get country catalog
dlw_server_catalog()
Server catalog
dlw_server_inventory()
filter server catolog to show inventory by country and other variables
